alert.note: Alert for Eastern Box Elder County; Great Salt Lake Desert and Mountains (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 03 at 2:24PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Box Elder County through 300 PM MDT... At 224 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 10 miles east of Park Valley, or 25 miles southwest of Snowville, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of north central Box Elder County. This includes the following highways... Interstate 84 between mile markers 3 and 5. Utah Route 30 between mile markers 62 and 72, and between mile markers 86 and 90. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Box Elder County; Great Salt Lake Desert and Mountains
